courses.name: Introduction to Computer Science

courses.name: Physics I

courses.name: World History
courses.description: Survey of major world civilizations and historical developments.

courses.name: Biology I
courses.description: Cell biology, genetics, and evolution principles.

courses.name: Chemistry I
courses.description: Atomic structure, bonding, and chemical reactions.

courses.name: Introduction to Psychology
courses.description: Overview of psychological principles, theories, and research methods.
